IX.iii.1.D.3.b
.
Advantages of Proportionate IVAP
Calculating the proportionate IVAP is only advantageous if the parent had income between the beginning of the calendar year and the effective date of the award that is proportionally greater than the income the parent received or expects to receive between the date of claim and the end of the year.
If the parent’s only income is a regular monthly income that does not change during the calendar year, the parent’s proportionate IVAP will equal the calendar-year IVAP.  Calculating the proportionate IVAP is not necessary in this case.
